siteDescriptionDefault: Portfolio of Dmytro Hovenko, Backend & Server-side Developer.
aboutText1: I'm Dmytro Hovenko, a Backend & Server-side Developer focused on building robust server solutions and backend systems. My main stack includes PHP, Laravel, C, C++, MySQL, and MSSQL. I am passionate about scalable server architectures and high-performance backend development.
aboutText2: My expertise covers backend APIs, server-side logic, database design, and game server development. I am committed to continuous learning and applying best practices in backend and server-side programming.
aboutText3: My main focus is server-side development, especially for game servers, clients, and related infrastructure. I have a strong interest in MMORPGs such as MuOnline, World of Warcraft (WoW), and Lineage 2 (La2), and aim to deliver reliable backend solutions for online gaming communities.
skillPhpDesc: Beginner. Backend scripting, RESTful APIs, authentication, database integration.
skillJsDesc: Beginner. Frontend interactivity and server-side with Node.js.
skillLaravelDesc: Beginner. PHP framework for backend and APIs.
skillJqueryDesc: Beginner. JavaScript library for DOM manipulation and UI enhancements.
skillMmorpDevDesc: Beginner. Server-side for MuOnline, WoW, La2.
skillCommunitySupportDesc: Beginner. Player needs, management, tech support.
darkheimDetails: A custom MMORPG server project for MuOnline with extensive server-side development. Features include custom game mechanics, database optimization, and security implementations.
projectSoonDetails: Details about this backend/server-side project will be added soon. Stay tuned!
contactMsg: Have a backend project in mind or want to discuss server-side solutions? Feel free to reach out!
resumeText: Get a detailed overview of my backend, server-side, and game server experience.
welcomeSub:
Backend & Server-side Developer
Specializing in Game Servers and Server Solutions
